results.content:
This is not a complete course.
1- There is no refresh token.
2- Some parts of the course the instructor uses HTML and CSS ready, there should be a downloads section to download initial files.
3- There is no source code / final repository for the developed system.

My analysis is that this course serves for you to look for another course.

results.content: This was really good tutorial, but it lacks source code and could really be improved with more content (for example showing errors that are coming from backend rather than writing our own). But anyway I'm really satisfied with this tutorials and I'm looking forward for more! Thank you
